name: Cave Runner (itch) (DrakePhantom)
description:
Controls :

Jump : up arrow or swipe up
Slide : down arrow or swip down
Go to the right : right arrow or touch at right of the player
Go to the left : left arrow or touch at left of the player

Credit :
Character  https://www.gameart2d.com/adventurer-girl---free-sprites.html

Background and map : https://szadiart.itch.io/pixel-fantasy-caves

Music : https://dos88.itch.io/dos-88-music-library

Voice : Super Dialogue Audio Pack by Dillon Becker. This work is licensed under CC BY 4.0
